Rs0.Description: 1st resting state epoch. True baseline, before any film clips are presented

En1.Description: 1st film clip. Either Shave or Leg

En2.Description: 2nd film clip. Either Eye or Seatbelt

En3.Description: 3rd film clip. Either Elephant or Shave

En4.Description: 4th film clip. Either Speeding or Elephant

En5.Description: 5th film clip. Either Leg or Speeding

En6.Description: 6th film clip. Either Seatbelt or Eye

Fx.Description: fixation cross + bell presented before start of film clip, to make sure participants focus their attention on the screen

weight.Description: relative magnitude of stimulus. Usually set to 1
